speaker: homer
dialog: Woah Day 4 already? Time surely flies when you are on vacation huh? Or is it work for your case.

speaker: neptune
dialog: You got the hang of the job right? No? Well, I am going to be a bringer of bad news and I just recalled I accidently ordered more colors on top of the new ones from 2 days ago.

speaker: homer
dialog: What? Don’t look at me like that, the paint was on sale! It was the premium products! Anyone would buy that deal. Or is it just me?

speaker: homer
dialog: I’m getting off track, the paints should be displayed similarly on the P.E.N.S Machine. Click on the right color, they will spray it.

speaker: homer
dialog: Ok Good Luck! Sorry about the paint!
